title: manam urugi azhaittAl
sahitya:
manam urugi azhaittAl varuvAnE nalla varangaLait-taruvAnE


anupallavi

  kanaka sabhaiyinilE kAl vIsi naTamADum karuNAkara mUrtiyai sharaNAgati aDaindE


caraNam    kaTTum kavalaigaLum kiTTa varuvaduNDO kAlanum ini vandu vAlai 
ATTuvaduNDO eTTik-kaniyinaiyum kaTTi mAmpazhamAkkum indrajAlanai 
mantrap-peyar sholli andiyum sandhiyum cintai sheid-anbuDan
